title: Pricing Model
description: Supported pricing models for advertising products

enumDescriptions.cpm: Cost Per Mille - cost per 1,000 impressions
enumDescriptions.vcpm: Viewable Cost Per Mille - cost per 1,000 viewable impressions (MRC standard)
enumDescriptions.cpc: Cost Per Click - cost per click on the ad
enumDescriptions.cpcv: Cost Per Completed View - cost per 100% video/audio completion
enumDescriptions.cpv: Cost Per View - cost per view at publisher-defined threshold (e.g., 50% completion)
enumDescriptions.cpp: Cost Per Point - cost per Gross Rating Point or Target Rating Point (TV/audio)
enumDescriptions.cpa: Cost Per Acquisition - cost per conversion event (purchase, lead, signup, etc.)
enumDescriptions.flat_rate: Flat Rate - fixed cost regardless of delivery volume (sponsorships, takeovers)
enumDescriptions.time: Time - cost per time unit (hour, day, week, or month) that scales with campaign duration
